last_episode_to_air.name: Out of Their League
last_episode_to_air.overview: When Mike and Weasel are reacquainted with an old college buddy who has gone on to great fortune after finishing his education at Yale, Mike and Weasel agree that they too should become ""Yalies."" But after an icy reception from pompous Professor Beaumont, Mike is convinced he is not cut out for the Ivy League, until his sister Kerry inspires him. Meanwhile, Marcia tries to help Jimmy recapture the sense of adventure that he feels he has lost since settling down. (NBC)

name: The Mike O'Malley Show
overview: The Mike O'Malley Show is an American sitcom on NBC that aired only two episodes. The series star, Mike O'Malley, created and executive produced the series with Les Firestein.
